name: Divination
description: Seers who glimpse the future to shape the present.

2.name: Divination Savant
2.description: The gold and time you must spend to copy a divination spell into your spellbook is halved.

2.name: Portent
2.description: After finishing a long rest, roll two d20s and record the numbers; you can replace any attack, save, or check made by you or a creature you can see with one of these rolls.

6.name: Expert Divination
6.description: When you cast a divination spell of 2nd level or higher, you regain one expended spell slot of a lower level (up to 5th).

10.name: The Third Eye
10.description: As an action, gain darkvision, ethereal sight, the ability to read any language, or see invisibility until you finish a short or long rest.

14.name: Greater Portent
14.description: You roll three d20s for your Portent feature instead of two.
